Ukrainian billionaire Zhevago fights off London fraud lawsuitUkrainian billionaire Kostyantyn Zhevago has won a bid to throw out a London lawsuit over allegations he embezzled money from the now bankrupt lender Finance & Credit Bank. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 13:08:15 GMT URMXOZWJ4FLAXCAI7DEKWEO5IE https://www.reuters.com/business/ukrainian-billionaire-zhevago-fights-off-london-fraud-lawsuit-2024-01-30/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Russia calls for investigation into allegations against UNRWA staffAllegations that some staff from the U.N. refugee agency for Palestinians (UNRWA) were involved in the Oct. 7 attack on Israel should be investigated, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:59:52 GMT 3NIB4YIDFBNODNKBR254GKQ56M https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-calls-investigation-into-allegations-against-unrwa-staff-2024-01-30/Reuters世界
Explainer: How is Northern Ireland governed and what’s next after DUP deal?Northern Ireland's largest pro-British party said on Tuesday it had agreed a deal with the United Kingdom government on the operation of post-Brexit trade rules that would pave the way for it to return to the region's power-sharing government. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:47:51 GMT HKSVYXN7S5NGBPGBIBTWJGJEKI https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/how-is-northern-ireland-governed-whats-next-after-dup-deal-2024-01-30/Reuters世界英国
French farmers block roads with tractors, press government for actionFarmers set bales of hay ablaze to partly block access to Toulouse airport in southwestern France on Tuesday and parked tractors across highways near Paris as they lobbied the government for help to make a living from their work. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:35:38 GMT BF6TX5OYSFLEHE7OKA3H3S6RJY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-farmers-block-roads-with-tractors-press-government-action-2024-01-30/Yves Herman, Marco Trujillo世界欧洲
Russia to Japan: Drop territorial claim if you want a peace treatySenior Russian security official Dmitry Medvedev told Japan on Tuesday it would have to drop territorial claims to a group of Pacific islands if it wanted to conclude a peace treaty with Russia formally ending World War Two. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:27:32 GMT BN4MY4Y3GRML5CCYNGTRPJMZIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-japan-drop-territorial-claim-if-you-want-peace-treaty-2024-01-30/Andrew Osborn世界
Nationalist candidate withdraws from Russian presidential race, endorses PutinSergei Baburin, a Russian nationalist politician who had announced his candidacy in presidential elections scheduled for March 15-17, said on Tuesday that he was pulling out of the race and endorsing the incumbent, Vladimir Putin. Long road ahead before Orban-Zelenskiy meeting - Hungary foreign ministerThere is a long road ahead before a meeting between Hungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orban and Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskiy can happen, the Hungarian foreign minister said at a briefing on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:17:14 GMT VASY5OJ22JIZ3ERA47LIAWVIDE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/long-road-ahead-before-orban-zelenskiy-meeting-hungary-foreign-minister-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Centre-right Stubb leads Finland's presidential race in pollCentre-right Alexander Stubb of the National Coalition Party is seen to lead liberal Green Party member Pekka Haavisto ahead of the run-off in Finland's presidential race on Feb. 11, a poll by Finland's largest daily Helsingin Sanomat showed on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:13:27 GMT GYSG6QCRCJKB3EO3ZTH7ZDM3ME https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/centre-right-stubb-leads-finland-presidential-race-poll-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
China, U.S. to cooperate on fentanyl, Beijing hopes for 'positive energy'The U.S. and China launched a joint counter-narcotics working group on Tuesday in the first overt sign of cooperation in tackling the spread of fentanyl since late 2019, before bilateral relations between the superpowers soured. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 12:08:17 GMT UVTKDWRCZRLEBI6GPP77M6E7YM https://www.reuters.com/world/china-us-cooperate-fentanyl-beijing-hopes-positive-energy-2024-01-30/Reuters世界
Taiwan air force shows off its sub hunting, early warning prowessTaiwan's air force showed off its armed-to-the-teeth submarine hunters and early warning and control aircraft on Tuesday, demonstrating how it keeps watch on the skies and waters around the Chinese-claimed island. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 11:47:50 GMT NQOG6BIU5NJPDBUDN4WKXJWINM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-air-force-shows-off-its-sub-hunting-early-warning-prowess-2024-01-30/Fabian Hamacher世界亚太地区
El Salvador's Bukele looks set for landslide election win on gang crackdownEl Salvador's President Nayib Bukele, who has described himself as the "World's Coolest Dictator," has in less than five years transformed El Salvador from a country infamous for its record on murder and gangs to a nation with one of the lowest homicide rates in the Americas. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 11:08:43 GMT O7AWPTJ4BJMQXEI6OK3NL5DTBE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvadors-seed-looks-set-landslide-election-win-gang-crackdown-2024-01-30/Sarah Kinosian, Nelson Renteria世界美洲
